verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra He cried בְאָזְנַ֗י <S%H241><s%> ve-'a-ze-Nai, also in mine ears ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol voice גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> ga-dOl with a loud לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying קָרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> ka-re-Vu to draw near פְּקֻדּ֣וֹת <S%H6486><s%> pe-kud-Dot Cause them that have charge הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; over the city וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish even every man כְּלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li weapon מַשְׁחֵת֖וֹ <S%H4892><s%> mash-che-To [with] his destroying בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. in his hand

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh Behold שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah And behold six אֲנָשִׁ֡ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim and every man בָּאִ֣ים׀ <S%H935><s%> ba-'Im came מִדֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> mid-de-rech- from the way שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הָעֶלְי֜וֹן <S%H5945><s%> ha-'el-Yon of the higher אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מָפְנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> ma-fe-Neh which lieth צָפ֗וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah, toward the north וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish man כְּלִ֤י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li weapon מַפָּצוֹ֙ <S%H4660><s%> map-pa-Tzo a slaughter בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, in his hand וְאִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> ve-'ish- man אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad and one בְּתוֹכָם֙ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham among לָבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> la-Vush them [was] clothed בַּדִּ֔ים <S%H906><s%> bad-Dim, with linen וְקֶ֥סֶת <S%H7083><s%> ve-Ke-set inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer with a writer's בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> be-ma-te-Nav; by his side וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they went in וַיַּ֣עַמְד֔וּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-Ya-'am-Du, and stood אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel beside מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach altar הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> han-ne-Cho-shet. the brasen

וּכְב֣וֹד׀ <S%H3519><s%> u-che-Vod And the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נַעֲלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> na-'a-Lah was gone up מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from הַכְּרוּב֙ <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-Ruv from the cherub אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had been עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and אֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> 'el to מִפְתַּ֣ן <S%H4670><s%> mif-Tan whereupon he was to the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; of the house וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra, And he called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish to the man הַלָּבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> hal-la-Vush clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim, with linen אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose קֶ֥סֶת <S%H7083><s%> Ke-set inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer which [had] the writer's בְּמָתְנָֽיו׃ <S%H4975><s%> be-ma-te-Nav. by his side ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God; אֵלֹו 'e-lov כאֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about קעֲבֹר֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Vor unto him Go through בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch the midst הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch through the midst יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem וְהִתְוִ֨יתָ <S%H8427><s%> ve-hit-Vi-ta and set תָּ֜ו <S%H8420><s%> tav a mark עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over מִצְח֣וֹת <S%H4696><s%> mitz-Chot upon the foreheads הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men הַנֶּֽאֱנָחִים֙ <S%H584><s%> han-ne-'e-na-Chim that sigh וְהַנֶּ֣אֱנָקִ֔ים <S%H602><s%> ve-han-Ne-'e-na-Kim, and that cry עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַתּ֣וֹעֵב֔וֹת <S%H8441><s%> hat-To-'e-Vot, for all the abominations הַֽנַּעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> han-na-'a-Sot that be done בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chah. in the midst

וּלְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> u-le-'El-leh And to the others אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar he said בְּאָזְנַ֔י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nai, in mine hearing עִבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'iv-Ru Go בָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> va-'Ir him through the city אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav ye after וְהַכּ֑וּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hak-Ku; and smite; עַל־ 'al- כאַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and תָּחֹ֥ס <S%H408><s%> ta-Chos nay ק; עֵינֵיכֶם 'ei-nei-chem כעֵינְכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ein-Chem affliction קוְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תַּחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <S%H2550><s%> tach-Mo-lu. neither have ye pity

זָקֵ֡ן <S%H2205><s%> za-Ken old בָּח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> ba-Chur [and] young וּבְתוּלָה֩ <S%H1330><s%> u-ve-tu-Lah both maids וְטַ֨ף <S%H2945><s%> ve-Taf and little children וְנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> ve-na-Shim and women תַּהַרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> ta-har-Gu Slay לְמַשְׁחִ֗ית <S%H4889><s%> le-mash-Chit, utterly וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish any man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and הַתָּו֙ <S%H8420><s%> hat-Tav upon whom [is] the mark אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּגַּ֔שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> tig-Ga-shu, but come not near וּמִמִּקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> u-mi-mik-da-Shi at my sanctuary תָּחֵ֑לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> ta-Chel-lu; and begin וַיָּחֵ֙לּוּ֙ <S%H2490><s%> vai-ya-Chel-lu Then they began בָּאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> ba-'a-na-Shim man הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> haz-ze-ke-Nim, at the ancient אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei which [were] before הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. the house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to טַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> tam-me-'U unto them Defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, the house וּמַלְא֧וּ <S%H4390><s%> u-mal-'U and fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֲצֵר֛וֹת <S%H2691><s%> ha-cha-tze-Rot the courts חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> cha-la-Lim with the slain צֵ֑אוּ <S%H3318><s%> Tze-'u; go ye forth וְיָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-tze-'U And they went forth וְהִכּ֥וּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-Ku and slew בָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> va-'Ir. in the city

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כְּהַכּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H5221><s%> ke-hak-ko-Tam, And it came to pass while they were slaying וְנֵֽאשֲׁאַ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> ve-ne-sha-'Ar them and I was left אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni; I וָאֶפְּלָ֨ה <S%H5307><s%> va-'ep-pe-Lah that I fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פָּנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֗ק <S%H2199><s%> va-'ez-'Ak, and cried וָֽאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar and said אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> 'a-Hah Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הֲמַשְׁחִ֣ית <S%H7843><s%> ha-mash-Chit wilt thou destroy אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, you אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit all the residue יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בְּשָׁפְכְּךָ֥ <S%H8210><s%> be-sha-fe-ke-Cha in thy pouring out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-te-Cha of thy fury עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. Jerusalem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me עֲוֹ֨ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von he unto me The iniquity בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah and Judah גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> ga-dOl great בִּמְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> bim-'Od is very מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, very וַתִּמָּלֵ֤א <S%H4390><s%> vat-tim-ma-Le is full הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz and the land דָּמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim, of blood וְהָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ve-ha-'Ir and the city מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> mal-'Ah full מֻטֶּ֑ה <S%H4297><s%> mut-Teh; of perverseness כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru, for they say עָזַ֤ב <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Zav hath forsaken יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the earth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein else יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD רֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh. seeth

וְגַ֨ם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam- again אֲנִ֔י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni, I לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> ta-Chos shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni And as for me also mine eye וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <S%H2550><s%> 'ech-Mol; neither will I have pity דַּרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> dar-Kam their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֥ם <S%H7218><s%> be-ro-Sham upon their head נָתָֽתִּי׃ <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti. [but] I will recompense

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold הָאִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And behold the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3830><s%> le-Vush apparel הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim, with linen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose הַקֶּ֙סֶת֙ <S%H7083><s%> hak-Ke-set which [had] the inkhorn בְּמָתְנָ֔יו <S%H4975><s%> be-ma-te-Nav, by his side מֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> me-Shiv reported דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var the matter לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying עָשִׂ֕יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I have done; כַאֲשֶׁר cha-'a-Sher ככְּכֹ֖ל ke-Chol ק; אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose קצִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ta-ni. as thou hast commanded ס sa-Mek
